actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to repeal medicare catastrophic coverage provisions effective in years after 1989 and the supplemental medicare premium, and for other purposes.
short_title: Medicare Catastrophic Coverage Repeal Act of 1989

summary.text: Medicare Catastrophic Coverage Repeal Act of 1989 - Repeals provisions of the Medicare Catastrophic Coverage Act of 1988 expanding coverage under part B (Supplementary Medical Insurance) of title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act and imposing a supplemental premium on Medicare beneficiaries. Adjusts the Medicare part B premium to such reduction of coverage.

titles.title: Medicare Catastrophic Coverage Repeal Act of 1989
A bill to repeal medicare catastrophic coverage provisions effective in years after 1989 and the supplemental medicare premium, and for other purposes.
